scripts.stage: sudo git clean -xdf && sudo git merge origin/master && sudo dotnet publish --configuration Release
scripts.poststage: npm run refresh-nginx && npm run refresh-postbucket-service
scripts.refresh-nginx: sudo systemctl restart nginx && sudo nginx -t && sudo systemctl status nginx
scripts.refresh-postbucket-service: sudo systemctl restart postbucket.mergedigital.service && sudo systemctl status postbucket.mergedigital.service
